name: roomler.tests
description: Community & Team Collaboration - Videoconferencing & Chat powered Communication
author: Goran Jovanov

scripts.test:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api node drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api ava --tap --verbose
scripts.test:drop-db: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api node drop-database.js
scripts.test:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=ui node drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=ui ava
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e node drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e ava
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=all node drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test ava cross-env TEST=e2e all
scripts.test-report:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api node drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=api nyc ava --tap --timeout=300000
scripts.test-report:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=ui node drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=ui nyc ava --tap --timeout=300000
scripts.test-report:e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e node drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=e2e nyc ava --tap --timeout=300000
scripts.test-report: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=all node drop-database.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test cross-env TEST=all nyc ava --tap --timeout=300000
